title: Peter Sloan
deck:
I’m married to the wonderful Nina, and we have 3 small & energetic children, Rachel, Hannah & Nathanael. Originally from Plymouth, I grew up in missions travelling the world.

I have a degree in theology & have a passion for teaching the Bible. I’m also a big sports fanatic & love movies (especially Star Wars).

At Gateway I lead a Lifegroup and I also oversee the church’s football team, Acomb Gateway FC, alongside serving on the committee for the league.
titleRole: Lifegroup Leader, Cluster Leader & Football Team Manager
words: I AM the Way and the Truth and the Life
